channel.title: Damn IP stealing noobs
channel.description: Idk if this is the right place to post, if not sorry but I've had it with those unfair mother fuckers, they use other people's 24/7 ips to add theirs there! i see that play.dodian.com is banned but play.dodian.com. works And I've seen that dude's server all day on 1st 3rd or 4th place. It's just not fair using other people's servers that are on 24/7 Mopar, u gotta ban play.dodian.com. with a dot at the end too.

item.title: Damn IP stealing noobs
item.dc:creator: @Emchie Emchie
item.description:
@Emchie wrote:

Bill, may i ask, what was the reason for you reply? It was just two quotes… If your going to post then post, dont spam by using other peoples quotes as your post.

Read full topic

item.title: Damn IP stealing noobs
item.dc:creator: @bill_dill_56 bill dill 56
item.description:
@bill_dill_56 wrote:

[quote=“Emchie, post:5, topic:268309”][quote author=Mitko link=topic=354118.msg2713159#msg2713159 date=1237458056]
Member search thing doesn’t work and i don’t know who’s staff here.
[/quote]

Here are the Staff and their repective positions. I may have missed some, sorry if I did.

Moparisthebest is an Administrator (Owner)
Niall is an Administrator
Algas is an Administrator
Waffendenis is an Administrator
Lothy is an Administrator
Taharok is a MoparScape Vet

there you go…stop posting shit like this.
M.dogg311 is a MoparScape Vet
